story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_0300_10:
Something is wrong with those Pokémon Team
Rocket’s manipulating. I can tell from their voices.
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Maybe they’ve lost control of their own will due to
the effect of Hoopa’s rampage on sync stones?
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_0700_10:
You’ve just confirmed you can understand
Pokémon speech!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Legendary Pokémon are usually fickle! They don’t
lend their power to just anyone!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_0900_10:
But Team Rocket and Team Break used Hoopa’s
power and are ordering them around with ease!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1000_10:
Why? And how? I was so intrigued, I just had to
investigate!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1200_10: Your statement just now supports my hypothesis!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1300_10:
I heard from others that you’re able to understand
what Pokémon say, although personally I was only
half-convinced!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Hey! Quit your yappin’! What’re you making all
that noise about over there?!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1500_10: If you CAN truly speak to Pokémon...
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1600_10:
surely that would be even MORE efficient at
drawing out their true potential!
story_final_02_03000/2401_1201_1700_10:
Er...Colress, I think we may need to focus on the
battle right now...
